messages.message: Who owns app API endpoints? I'm planning on changing what's returned to the browser when training Classifier, and want to confirm this doesn't affect anything other than the Classifier app. This would involve changing what the celery task `run_train_classifier` returns when the job finishes. (cc @Heymian @shaunak).
As far as I know run train classifier is only used in the frontend classifier app. @Jonathan Shih might know more.
That’s all I know as well. I can’t be sure if it’s somehow used somewhere else though. I would do a search for “run_train_classifier.si (http://classifier.si)” and trace any other calls.
sounds good! how does tracing calls work?
haha i just mean look for anywhere in the code that calls “run_train_classifier.si (http://classifier.si)” and then look for anywhere that calls whatever called that, etc
there shouldn’t be many, so it shouldn’t be too bad
ah gotcha, wasn't sure if you meant distributed tracing
